versos: (lachish) 2 Kings 18:14 - And Hezekiah king of Judah sent to the king of Assyria at lachish, saying, "I have done wrong; withdraw from me. Whatever you impose on me I will bear." And the king of Assyria required of Hezekiah king of Judah three hundred talents of silver and thirty talents of gold.;;;

(sticks) Ezekiel 37:16 - And you, son of man, take a stick and write on it, 'For Judah, and the people of Israel associated with him'; then take another stick and write on it, 'For Joseph the stick of Ephraim and all the house of Israel associated with him.';;;
(bid) Luke 14:7 - And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden, when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms; saying to them,;;;
(famous) Proverbs 22:1 - "A good name is more desirable than great riches; to be esteemed is better than silver or gold.";;;
(swallow) "They open their mouths to swallow me like a lion, eager to tear me apart." - Psalm 22:13 NIV;;;

(perished) 2 Peter 3:9 - "The Lord is not slow in keeping his promise, as some understand slowness. Instead he is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish, but everyone to come to repentance.";;;
(blossom) Isaiah 27:6 - In the days to come
(dying) Mark 15:44 - Pilate was surprised to hear that he was already dead. He called the centurion to ask him if Jesus had already died.;;;
(pollute) Ezekiel 7:23 - "Make a chain, for the land is full of bloody crimes and the city is full of violence.";;;
(purify) Psalm 51:7 - "Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean; wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.";;;
(vines) Psalm 80:8 - "You transplanted a vine from Egypt; you drove out the nations and planted it.";;;
(vexed) Genesis 26:34 - "And Esau was forty years old when he took to wife Judith the daughter of Beeri the Hittite, and Bashemath the daughter of Elon the Hittite:";;;

(strip) Isaiah 20:4 - "so shall the king of Assyria lead away the Egyptian captives and the Ethiopian exiles, both the young and the old, naked and barefoot, with buttocks uncovered, to the shame of Egypt.";;;
(fiery) 1 Peter 4:12 - "Beloved, do not be surprised at the fiery trial when it comes upon you to test you, as though something strange were happening to you.";;;
